resources.string: Lviv is the best city of Ukraine!!!
App to create and send email

I was born on 12.19.1963 in the city of Khorostkiv, Ternopil region. Since I graduated from Lviv State University in 1985, I have been working and living in Lviv (the best city of Ukraine).
 My experience as a C/C++ developer and electronics engineer is more 36 years. I started my professional work as a student (1983â€“1985. University research sector as a Laboratory assistant. Repairing and maintenance of electronic equipment. Software development.). Then I continued a long professional path as an engineer and programmer:
 1985 - 2003 RD Division in Scientific Research Institute of PHTE Lviv
 2005 - 2011 PDT Ukraine
 2012 - 2017 Cypress Microsystems
 2018 - 2019 Ezlo Innovation
 2021 - 2023 Intellias
 However, it is never too late to learn - now I aspire to become an Android developer as well. I want to start my own business, combined with Home Automation, to pass on to my nephew and my grandson.
